resources.string:
Welcome to three three five. Easy
\ free
\ navigation
\ to thousands of online radio stations,
\ as well as media on your device.
\

Please select an interface:
\ Press on the right side
\ to launch the button interface,
\ 
\ Press on the left side
\ to launch large
\ text interface.
\

Welcome
\ to the three three five button interface navigation screen.
\ 
\ PLEASE LISTEN FOR BUTTON DESCRIPTIONs.
\ 
\ This screen has 3 rows of buttons.
\ 
\ The top TWO rowS HAVE 3 navigation buttons.
\ the 3rd row has 5.
\ THREE THREE FIVE 
\ 
\ 
\ Starting from left to right.
\ 
\ ROW NUMBER 1.
\ FIRST.
\ Top Left IS HOME button.
\ Pressing HOME all ways brings you back to the top of your chosen category.
\ Second:
\ 
\ Top Center is Back button.
\ Pressing BACK takes you one step back.
\ 
\ Third:
\ Top right is location button.
\ 
\ Pressing LOCATION will tell you where you are in the file and folder structure.
\ 
\ 
\ ROW NUMBER 2
\ 
\ First BUTTON IS
\ PREVIOUS.
\ PREVIOUS BUTTON Takes you to the last location.
\ 
\ Second BUTTON IS
\ ENTER.
\ 
\ THIS button like an ENTER button.
\ This button Enters you into your folder selection or if it's a media file or stream, it will load TO PLAY.
\ 
\ Third IS THE NEXT button.
\ 
\ takes you to next folder or next file within CURRENT folder.
\ 
\ 
\ The third bottom row has 5 media player controls .
\ 
\ First IS Skip.
\ SKIPS to previous track or file.
\ 
\ Second BUTTON IS seek.
\ SEEKS 10 seconds back.
\ 
\ Third BUTTON IS: Play AND Pause.
\ 
\ Fourth BUTTON seekS 10 seconds forward.
\ 
\ And the Fifth AND FINAL BUTTON IS SKIP.
\ SkipS. forward to next track.
\ 
\ 
\ All media files are organized in hierarchical folder structure.
\ 
\ 
\ Please feel free to click around to familiarize yourself with three three five navigation,
\ 
\ remember,
\ you can always click on top right to hear your present location.
\ in the folder and file structure 
\ You can also long press anywhere ON THIS SCREEN to hear the button description.
\ 
\ 
\ YOU CAN HEAR THESE INSTRUCTIONS AGAIN ANYTIME IN THE PREFERENCES SECTION.
\ 
\
You are now on the home screen on "Music on Your Device".\n\ \n\ Thank you and enjoy three three five.

You are now on the preference screen on "Replay Interface Instructions".
\ 
\ Thank you
\ we hope you enjoy three three five.
